name: Gangsta Auto Thief III - Reckless Sky Hustle From West-Coast Bullet City to San Gangster Street City
name_original: Gangsta Auto Thief III - Reckless Sky Hustle From West-Coast Bullet City to San Gangster Street City
description:
"Gangsta Auto Thief III - F18 Storm Raiders & World of Warplanes" is the third installment in the popular Gangsta Auto Thief game series.

As the Main Homie In Charge finally owns the streets in both San Gangster City and in West-Coast City he now has mad turf to defend. He thus steps his BO$$ game up and resorts to aircrafts to handle transportation between the two turfs!


****************
THE GAMEPLAY
****************
Hardcore dynamic gameplay includes 2 Power Ups. The Cash Magnet generates.. well, loads of CASH, but you're not the only one into the dough. Everyone and their mama will be coming after it! And the Maximum Velocity power up... Well, you gotta see that beast for yourself!

Earn cash to unlock new aircrafts, or visit the Ghetto Cash Exchange Store to instantly stack up on more cash!

For the first time Gangsta Auto Thief offers multiple Worlds for you to dominate! Get your Area 51 on in the Grand Springs desert, fly low over West-Coast City downtown, and check the scenery at Seaport Town.


Welcome to the Streets of the Skies. Explosions. Military Jets. Helicopters. Paratroopers and Jetpacks. And a whole lot of madness!


***** Download this FREE game TODAY*****
